feedback.title: Let's Improve the Dashboard Together!
feedback.description: We don't just want to show you meaningful data - we also want to give you a great experience. Help us to make this happen by giving your feedback in the box below. We are interested in:

questions.question1: What data are you using on a daily basis?
questions.question2: What is missing from the dashboard?
